c:complexType.name: LegendPanelOptions
c:complexType.c:documentation:
The options documentation class of the CCC legend panel.
The default
is 'bottom'.
The default
is '10px sans-serif'.
The default
is 5 pixels.

c:property.name: textMargin
c:property.c:documentation: The space between the marker and the associated label, in pixel units.

c:property.name: itemPadding
c:property.c:documentation: Half the space between legend items, in pixel units.

c:property.name: markerSize
c:property.c:documentation:
The width and height of the marker panel.
The marker itself will be slightly smaller.

c:property.name: drawLine
c:property.c:documentation:
Forces a rule to be shown or not in the marker zone.
The default value depends on the chart type.

c:property.name: drawMarker
c:property.c:documentation:
Forces a shape to be shown or not in the marker zone.
The default value depends on the chart type.

c:property.name: shape
c:property.c:documentation:
Forces a given shape to be used in the marker zone.
The default value depends on the chart type.

c:property.name: clickMode
c:property.c:documentation: What happens when the user clicks a legend item.

c:property.name: extensionPoints
c:property.c:documentation: The extension points provided by the legend panel.

c:complexType.name: LegendPanelExtensionPoints
c:complexType.c:documentation:
The extension points of the legend panel.
To use an extension point you must find its full name: join the prefix property name, like , with one of the properties of the type of the extension point, like , with an "_" character in between, and obtain the name legendArea_strokeStyle.

c:property.name: legendArea
c:property.c:documentation: The extension point of the top panel of the legend panel.

c:property.name: legendPanel
c:property.c:documentation: The extension point of legend item panels.

c:property.name: legendLabel
c:property.c:documentation: The extension point of the label of a legend item.

c:property.name: legendDot
c:property.c:documentation: The extension point of the dot (the marker's shape) of a legend item.

c:property.name: legendRule
c:property.c:documentation: The extension point of the rule (the marker's line) of a legend item.
